name: blockchain-tokenization-platform
description: A blockchain tokenization platform demo with ERC-20 token creation, marketplace simulation, and admin dashboard

scripts.bootstrap: npm i && npm --workspace contracts i && npm --workspace app i
scripts.build: npm --workspace contracts run build && npm --workspace app run build
scripts.dev: npm --workspace contracts run compile && node ./scripts/copy-artifacts.js && npm --workspace app run dev
scripts.deploy:mumbai: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mumbai
scripts.deploy:bsc: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network bscTestnet
